main event: A commercial airline pilot observed six white lights in formation over Houghton Lake, Michigan on July 25, 1964.
interesting points: The pilot and crew members reported unusual flight characteristics of the lights,The sighting lasted for 5 minutes,The objects displayed maneuvers by fading,There was no physical evidence left after the sighting,No known similar cases were recorded in the area.
sighted object: six white lights in echelon formation
witness description: commercial airline pilot and crew members
